name: TextureSourceOptions
description: options for creating a new TextureSource

properties.name: resource
properties.description: the resource that will be uploaded to the GPU. This is where we get our pixels from eg an ImageBimt / Canvas / Video etc

properties.name: width
properties.description: the pixel width of this texture source. This is the REAL pure number, not accounting resolution

properties.name: height
properties.description: the pixel height of this texture source. This is the REAL pure number, not accounting resolution

properties.name: format
properties.description: the format that the texture data has

properties.name: antialias
properties.description: Only really affects RenderTextures. Should we use antialiasing for this texture. It will look better, but may impact performance as a Blit operation will be required to resolve the texture.

properties.name: dimensions
properties.description: how many dimensions does this texture have? currently v8 only supports 2d

properties.name: mipLevelCount
properties.description: The number of mip levels to generate for this texture. this is  overridden if autoGenerateMipmaps is true

properties.name: autoGenerateMipmaps
properties.description: Should we auto generate mipmaps for this texture? This will automatically generate mipmaps for this texture when uploading to the GPU. Mipmapped textures take up more memory, but can look better when scaled down. For performance reasons, it is recommended to NOT use this with RenderTextures, as they are often updated every frame. If you do, make sure to call `updateMipmaps` after you update the texture.

properties.name: alphaMode
properties.description: the alpha mode of the texture

properties.name: label
properties.description: optional label, can be used for debugging

properties.name: autoGarbageCollect
properties.description: If true, the Garbage Collector will unload this texture if it is not used after a period of time

properties.name: defaultOptions
properties.type:
TextureSourceOptions = {
        resolution: 1,
        format: 'bgra8unorm',
        alphaMode: 'premultiply-alpha-on-upload',
        dimensions: '2d',
        mipLevelCount: 1,
        autoGenerateMipmaps: false,
        sampleCount: 1,
        antialias: false,
        autoGarbageCollect: false,
    }

properties.name: width
_resource
